summary: A dying writer bases his last book on his own perception of his family.
cast: Dirk Bogarde|Ellen Burstyn|John Gielgud|David Warner|Elaine Stritch|Cyril Luckham|Denis Lawson|Kathryn Leigh Scott|Milo Sperber|Anna Wing|Peter Arne|Tanya Lopert|Joseph Pittoors|Samson Fainsilber
title: Providence
